scriptLines: derivedColumn8, endArticulation join({Document de vente} == Commande,
derivedColumn19, endOffre join({Référence Offre BA} == Offre,
tempDist = iif(lower(WholeSalerID)=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',
derivedColumn3 filter(({Canal distribution} !="42" ) &&  (!isNull({Articulation Origin}) && !isNull({Offre origin}))) ~> filter3
derivedColumn3 filter({Canal distribution} =="42" || (isNull({Articulation Origin}) || isNull({Offre origin}))) ~> filter4
endFactAVM derive({Qté facturée} = toInteger({Qté facturée})) ~> derivedColumn16
